summary: Fixed 500 error in products API route. Issues: 1) Removed 'mode: insensitive' from Prisma queries (SQLite doesn't support it), 2) Added safe JSON parsing with error handling, 3) Improved error messages with development details. Database verified - Product table exists with 29 products. Regenerated Prisma client.
current_status: Fixed SQLite compatibility and JSON parsing issues in products API. Error should be resolved now.
